name: reveal on git webpage
desc: VS Code Extension to reveal the current file on your Git hosting webpage (GitHub, GitLab, etc)

name: uptime
desc: Windows and Mac app that calculates your working time and break time based on system logs

name: mac explorer
desc: File explorer for mac featuring tabs, favorites, search, sorting and quick actions

name: deployboard
desc: A dashboard for managing docker contianer that are a described as yaml-files on gitlab

name: tool
desc: Simple webpage for encoding/decoding strings into json, base64, url and sha256

name: ar brick viewer
desc: A Website you can open with a smartphone an a browser supporting webxr, where you can take a look at a brick in 3d space

name: ar brick building
desc: A Hololens App to build with virtual bricks with snapping

name: stereo view renderer
desc: A Website that uses the smartphone orientation to provide a 3d illusion with help of stereo view renderer. You need to put your smartphone in vr glasses, so your brain converts the two rendered images into a stero image

name: closest pair
desc: Website that compares different algorithms which finding the closest pair in a set of points.

name: forecasting
desc: Website that compares different forecasting techniques with their parameters

name: product similarity search
desc: Website where you can upload a csv and filter with min and max and request and then search with similarity for products
